roleset.name: occur over again
roleset.note: RECUR-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls occurrence-48.3. (from recur.01-v)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Mr. Lawson's resignation shocked many analysts, despite the recent recurring speculation of a rift between the chancellor and Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher.

example.name: ARG1
example.text: [Of these forty-five cases]-1, in ten *trace*-1 the hernia recurred
